text: Hiromu Shinozuka (, born 27 March 1979 in Fukuoka) is a Japanese manga artist. She writes in Ciao. She came out with Takkyu shoujo in 1999. ==Famous works== *Chenge! *Mirrumo de pon! *Koisuru purin *Chibiâ˜†debi!! ==Other websites== * Profile at Ciao Magazine site * Hiromu Shinozuka at Anime News Network's Encyclopedia Category:Japanese manga artists Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:People from Fukuoka Prefecture
title: Hiromu Shinozuka
